mapper.insert: insert into system_user (logic_code, name, phone, photo, type, level,score, login_name, login_password, email, address, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete) values (#{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update system_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_password = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update system_user
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where login_name = #{userName,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cid, logic_code, name, phone, photo, type, level, login_name, login_password, email, address, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete from system_user where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select cid, logic_code, name, phone, photo, type, level, login_name, login_password, email, address, create_time, modify_time, create_user_code, modify_user_code, is_delete from system_user
